title: Intangible Cultural Heritage Digital Preservation and Collaborative Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of intangible cultural heritage concepts, basic ICT proficiency, and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: University Student Groups Composed of Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields Approach Intangible Cultural Heritage Preservation Issues Using Mathematical Modeling in a BYOD Environment

learning_goals: Learners can design digital archiving processes for intangible cultural heritage through mathematical modeling
Develop at least three ICT-based educational scenarios using collaborative design tools
Identify and propose over 80% of cultural heritage transmission risk factors by applying TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) techniques

resources: 3D Scanned Dataset of Intangible Cultural Heritage

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
